<title level="1" right="Action">[Tail Toxin](/Actions.aspx?ID=540) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 14 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Frequency** once per day

**Requirements** You are wielding a piercing or slashing weapon.

</column>

---

You apply your tail's venom to a piercing or slashing weapon. If your next Strike with that weapon before the end of your next turn hits and deals damage, you deal [persistent poison damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) equal to your level to the target.

requirement: You are wielding a piercing or slashing weapon.
